info.description: Photo management system API with asset upload, processing, and organization features
info.title: Lumilio-Photos Manager API

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of assets with optional filtering by type, owner, or search query

parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination
parameters.name: offset

post.description: Upload a single photo, video, audio file or document to the system

parameters.description: Client-calculated BLAKE3 hash of the file
parameters.name: X-Content-Hash

400.description: Bad request - no file provided or parse error

post.description: Batch uploads multiple assets using a multipart/form-data request. The field name for each file part must be its BLAKE3 content hash.

400.description: Bad request - no files provided or parse error

get.description: Retrieve a list of all supported asset types in the system
Retrieve detailed information about a specific asset with optional relationships

put.description: Update the specific metadata of an asset (e.g., photo EXIF data, video metadata)

400.description: Invalid asset ID or request body

delete.description: Soft delete an asset by marking it as deleted (does not remove the physical file)

post.description: Associate an asset with a specific album

400.description: Invalid asset ID or album ID

get.description: Serve the original file content for an asset
get.summary: Get original file by asset ID

get.description: Retrieve a specific thumbnail image for an asset by asset ID and size parameter
get.summary: Get asset thumbnail by ID and size

400.description: Invalid asset ID or size parameter

post.description: Authenticate user with username and password

get.description: Get information about the currently authenticated user

post.description: Generate a new access token using a valid refresh token
Create a new user account with username, email, and password

code.description: Business status code (0 for success, non-zero for errors)

error.description: Debug error message, ignore empty values

success.description: Whether the file was successfully queued

message.example: File received and queued for processing

models.Album.description: Album for organizing and grouping related assets

description.example: Photos and videos from our summer vacation

models.Asset.description: Digital asset (photo, video, audio, document) with metadata and relationships

models.AuthResponse.description: Authentication response containing tokens and user info

models.Tag.description: Tag for categorizing and labeling assets

models.Thumbnail.description: Thumbnail image for assets (photos, videos, etc.)

mime_type.description: For video thumbnails, this might be image/jpeg

models.UserResponse.description: User information for API responses (excludes sensitive data)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
